title: Drawing, "Sky over the Sea; Verso: Botanical sketches, Rooftops", May 1857
inscribed: Written lower right: "From Steamer Illinois / May-57." Verso: "Another plant / a flag grows behind the grasses... generally brown toward the bottom / ...floating plants... / yellow and light brown + green stem / balls or clusters of foliage / green or brown orange [crossed out] over pink...grasses water."
description: Sketch of sunset with color notations written in. Verso: sketches of roof-tops, tops of palm trees, grasses and floating plants.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Sky over the Sea; Verso: Botanical sketches, Rooftops", May 1857. Pencil, paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-227.
